missionText: Yeh free financial app isliye banayi gayi hai taaki paise ka samajh aur uska prabandhan aasan ho sake.

emily.name: Emily
emily.desc: Mera naam Emily Perez hai. Mujhe kutte pasand hain.

ishaank.name: Ishaank
ishaank.desc: Mera naam Ishaank Zalpuri hai. Main manoranjan ka shaukeen hoon (mujhe movies, games, waqaira pasand hain).

dani.name: Dani (Git Master aur Frontend Lead)
dani.desc: Maine logo aur webapp design kiya hai. Mujhe zombie movies aur tacos pasand hain. Main software engineering ke baare mein aur seekhna chahta hoon.

gene.name: Gene
gene.desc: Mera naam Gene Orias hai. Mujhe santre pasand hain :D

jonathan.name: Jonathan
jonathan.desc: Mera naam Jonathan Gonzalez hai. Mujhe music banana pasand hai.

andrew.name: Andrew
andrew.desc: Mera naam Andrew Brockenborough hai. Mujhe computers pasand hain.
